channel.title: RSCEclipse [Quests | Clans | 24/7 | New Update: Classes!]
channel.description:
Hello Moparscapers,
I am now releasing my Beta Client for RSCEclipse
The server is online.
Just a few Features off the top of my Head:
Quests Clan System Kill/Death System (Not fully functional) Updated GUI 10x XP Rate PVP System New Herbs (Creds to my main Korean Man YONGYYY) - Love you Yong :)
Fixed Total XP Required from level 92-99 (Raised it by 2 Million XP Overall to Make it slightly longer lasting
Fully Functional High Scores Fully Functional Status Page
More Updates are on the Website
[img]http://imgcash5.imageshack.us/img31/5606/screenshot0.th.png[/img] [img]http://imgcash5.imageshack.us/img197/4340/screenshot1t.th.png[/img] [img]http://imgcash4.imageshack.us/img199/2929/screenshot2i.th.png[/img] [img]http://imgcash1.imageshack.us/img5/7694/screenshot3jje.th.png[/img]
[img]http://imgcash4.imageshack.us/img32/1492/screenshot4m.th.png[/img] [img]http://imgcash6.imageshack.us/img34/5497/screenshot5a.th.png[/img] [img]http://imgcash3.imageshack.us/img5/5808/screenshot6m.th.png[/img] [img]http://imgcash3.imageshack.us/img5/8089/screenshot7x.th.png[/img]
[img]http://imgcash4.imageshack.us/img38/4028/screenshot8u.th.png[/img] [img]http://imgcash1.imageshack.us/img31/7919/screenshot9.th.png[/img] [img]http://imgcash2.imageshack.us/img197/3010/screenshot10.th.png[/img] [img]http://imgcash6.imageshack.us/img199/1521/screenshot11.th.png[/img]
[img]http://imgcash1.imageshack.us/img5/1449/screenshot12k.th.png[/img] [img]http://imgcash3.imageshack.us/img32/5323/screenshot13c.th.png[/img] [img]http://imgcash2.imageshack.us/img193/9821/screenshot14b.th.png[/img] [img]http://imgcash3.imageshack.us/img5/6550/screenshot15nzx.th.png[/img]
[img]http://imgcash3.imageshack.us/img5/384/screenshot16l.th.png[/img] [img]http://imgcash2.imageshack.us/img38/5581/screenshot17j.th.png[/img] [img]http://imgcash2.imageshack.us/img189/5716/screenshot18.th.png[/img] [img]http://imgcash4.imageshack.us/img190/5127/screenshot19a.th.png[/img]
[img]http://imgcash5.imageshack.us/img41/4232/screenshot20u.th.png[/img] [img]http://imgcash2.imageshack.us/img34/9137/screenshot21.th.png[/img] [b][u][size=10pt]New Update: Classes[/size][/u][/b] Upon Login for the first time you can choose your Class!!
Warrior Archer Magician Miner Monk Craftsman Adventurer Herbalist Fisherman
Each Class Gets their own Official Stat Boost along with their own specific items at the start.
[URL=http://img189.imageshack.us/my.php?image=screenshot3c.png][IMG]http://img189.imageshack.us/img189/5706/screenshot3c.th.png[/img][/URL][URL=http://img41.imageshack.us/my.php?image=screenshot2bvz.png][IMG]http://img41.imageshack.us/img41/7294/screenshot2bvz.th.png[/img][/URL][URL=http://img31.imageshack.us/my.php?image=screenshot1umo.png][IMG]http://img31.imageshack.us/img31/9176/screenshot1umo.th.png[/img][/URL][URL=http://img221.imageshack.us/my.php?image=screenshot0.png][IMG]http://img221.imageshack.us/img221/5606/screenshot0.th.png[/img][/URL]
I Hope you Enjoy!!
For the Slide Show Presentation:
http://img34.imageshack.us/slideshow/player.php?id=img34/2979/12448437850ty.smil
Few More Features: ::Fatigue--Gives 100% Fatigue ::Skull--Gives Skull for 20 Minutes ::Online (Fixed it)
Forums=Signature Client DL= [url=http://uppit.com/v/W758TR51]http://uppit.com/v/W758TR51[/url]
Thank You, Pesterd

item.title: RSCEclipse [Quests | Clans | 24/7 | New Update: Classes!]
item.dc:creator: @pesterd pesterd
item.description:
@pesterd wrote:

No one is leaving RSCA Regardless unless they get banned or whatever. But its fine. I dont mind Ill raise the XP Rates to 20x But I will also be raising the amount of XP Required for some levels so It evens out.

Right now you need 15M XP For a 99 Stat. Ill make it that you need 17M XP

Read full topic

item.title: RSCEclipse [Quests | Clans | 24/7 | New Update: Classes!]
item.dc:creator: @ephexx ephexx
item.description:
@ephexx wrote:

[quote=“pesterd, post:28, topic:283306”]Soo 1 guy says yess one guy says no…

Where should I stand on this one :)[/quote]

As already stated somewhere, not many people are going to leave RSCA for another low-XP rate server which is much less populated and - no offense, much less developed.

Read full topic

item.title: RSCEclipse [Quests | Clans | 24/7 | New Update: Classes!]
item.dc:creator: @Lavoris Lavoris
item.description:
@Lavoris wrote:

Cool shit bro.

Looks like some of Project P2P’s stuff in there, back when my old (buggy) source got released.

FYI, That quest where it says “Sil”

It’s buggy, make sure you don’t put any good items at teh end of it, When I had it, someone managed to get liek over 9000 r2hs’ and sold them to general store…

GL to your server.

Read full topic
